entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
